definition: billowing smoke (idiom)/foul atmosphere/(fig.) murky atmosphere/in a turmoil
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
crow/black
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
malaria/miasma
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: I’ve choked on the dust of Changsha in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 也曾在乌烟瘴气的湖南长沙呼不给吸。

sentences.english: Cigar smoke and ignorance are in the air.
sentences.chinese: 乌烟瘴气和无知充斥着整个会谈。

sentences.english: In fog and smog, you recondition my air.
sentences.chinese: 在乌烟瘴气中，你赐我清新的空气。

sentences.english: Poisonous sewage of the nautical mile, in the sky fill the air of the poisonous Yan of foul air.
sentences.chinese: 海里的有毒污水，天上弥漫的乌烟瘴气的毒焰。

sentences.english: Marathon canceled due to smoky air from LA fire.
sentences.chinese: 由于从洛杉矶大火乌烟瘴气，马拉松取消。

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
everything in disorder (idiom)/in a hideous mess/obscene/dirty/filthy
chaos/bungle/complete mess/shambles
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
lit. cries of complaint fill the roads (idiom); complaints rise all around/discontent is openly voiced
lit. wind and rain sweeping through the town (idiom)/fig. a big scandal/an uproar/the talk of the town
overpowering (of a stench)
fire beacons on all sides (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war
to mess around/to mess with something/to have an affair
lit. to pour dog's blood on (idiom)/fig. torrent of abuse
to make an (unnecessary) racket (idiom)
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
to do/to make/to go in for/to set up/to get hold of/to take care of
in a mess/upside down
muddled and completely collapsing (idiom); in an awful condition/complete shambles/a total mess
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
